title: Surviving Spies
description: Before you embark on a journey of revenge, dig three graves.Lu Leiâ€™s perfect childhood evaporates when a double homicide rips her family apart. But as she realizes that the mysterious couple watching over her are CIA spies, her lust for vengeance leads her to the discovery of new talents and tools.The Chinese Communist Party is violently cracking down on the Falun Gong, and Lu Lei's new family may soon be in the crosshairs of the secret police.Who will pull the trigger?Who will survive?Don't miss the second in series by Irving Waters!
author: Irving Waters
